entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023
